article:
A professor told his students to go into the city slums   to study the life of 200 boys. He asked them to _ reports about each boy's life and future. One of the students wrote,"They don't have any _ ."
Twenty-five years _ , another professor read about the earlier study. He told his students to find out what had happened _ the boys. They tried very hard and found that 176 of the boys had become successful _ doctors, teachers and scientists.
The professor was very _ and decided to study it further. Luckily, all of them were living near the place and he was able to ask each one,"What made you _ ?"Each one answered,"It was a teacher."
The teacher was _ living there, so the professor found _ and asked the old woman _ she had done to pull those boys out of the slums, and change them _ successful people.
The teacher's _ began to shine and said with a sweet smile,"It's really very easy. I love those boys."
